name: govcore/govcore_workflow
description: Tools to improve your content workflow.

suggest.drupal/autosave_form: Provides an autosave feature for all forms, including entity forms.
suggest.drupal/conflict: Provides a UI to resolve conflicts when an entity is edited by two people at the same time.
suggest.drupal/diff: Adds a tab displaying all added/changed/deleted words between revisions.
suggest.drupal/moderation_dashboard: Provides a per-user dashboard for managing moderated content.
suggest.drupal/moderation_sidebar: Provides an off-canvas menu to moderate the current entity.
